channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Linux kernel's DPT I2O Controller driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Linux kernel's DPT I2O Controller driver

item.title: CVE-2023-2007|2024-01-19T16:06:21.861961 -- n%2Fa -- linux%20kernel%27s%20dpt%20i2o%20controller%20driver
item.description: The specific flaw exists within the DPT I2O Controller driver. The issue results from the lack of proper locking when performing operations on an object. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the kernel.
